item.title: SGU 127 - Telephone directory
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description CIA has decided to create a special telephone directory for its agents. The first 2 pages of the directory contain the name of the directory and instructions for agents, telephone number records begin on the third page. Each record takes exactly one line and consists of 2 parts: the phone number and the location of the phone. The phone number is 4 digits long. Phone numbers cannot start with

item.title: SGU 112 - a^b - b^a
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description You are given natural numbers $a$ and $b$. Find $a^b - b^a$. Input Input contains numbers $a$ and $b$ ($1\leq a,b\leq 100$). Output Write answer to output. Sample Input 1 2 3 Sample Output 1 -1 Analysis 非常明显的高精度，再观察一下样例，要处理减法，而且有负数，注意一

item.title: SGU 113 - Nearly prime numbers
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description Nearly prime number is an integer positive number for which it is possible to find such primes $P_1$ and $P_2$ that given number is equal to $P_1\cdot P_2$. There is given a sequence on $N$ integer positive numbers, you are to write a program that prints “Yes” if given number is nearly prime and “No” otherwise. Input Input file consists of $N + 1$ numbers. First is positive integer

item.title: SGU 107 - 987654321 problem
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description For given number $N$ you must output amount of $N$-digit numbers, such, that last digits of their square is equal to 987654321. Input Input contains integer number $N$ ($1\leq N\leq 10^6$). Output Write answer in output file. Sample Input 1 8 Sample Output 1 0 Analysis 在一定意义上，这也是一道数学题。 由于一个数平方

item.title: SGU 184 - Patties
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description Petya is well-known with his famous cabbage patties. Petya’s birthday will come very soon, and he wants to invite as many guests as possible. But the boy wants everybody to try his specialty of the house. That’s why he needs to know the number of the patties he can cook using the stocked ingredients. Petya has $P$ grams of flour, $M$ milliliters of milk and $C$ grams of cabbage.

item.title: SGU 135 - Drawing Lines
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description Little Johnny likes to draw a lot. A few days ago he painted lots of straight lines on his sheet of paper. Then he counted in how many zones the sheet of paper was split by these lines. He noticed that this number is not always the same. For instance, if he draws 2 lines, the sheet of paper could be split into 4, 3 or even 2 (if

item.title: SGU 115 - Calendar
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description First year of new millenium is gone away. In commemoration of it write a program that finds the name of the day of the week for any date in 2001. Input Input is a line with two positive integer numbers $N$ and $M$, where $N$ is a day number in month $M$. $N$ and $M$ is not more than 100. Output Write current number of the day of the

item.title: SGU 123 - The Sum
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description The Fibonacci sequence of numbers is known: $F_1 = 1$; $F_2 = 1$; $F_{n+1} = F_n + F_{n-1}$, for $n>1$. You have to find $S$ - the sum of the first $K$ Fibonacci numbers. Input First line contains natural number $K$ ($0<K<41$). Output First line should contain number $S$. Sample Input 1 5 Sample Output 1 12 Analysis 考虑到数据范围，这道题

item.title: SGU 105 - Div 3
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description There is sequence 1, 12, 123, 1234, …, 12345678910, … . Given first $N$ elements of that sequence. You must determine amount of numbers in it that are divisible by 3. Input Input contains $N$ ($1\leq N\leq 2^{31} - 1$). Output Write answer in output file. Sample Input 1 4 Sample Output 1 2 Analysis 由于一个数对 $3$ 取模恒等于这个

item.title: SGU 102 - Coprimes
item.author: 作者
item.description: Description For given integer $N$ ($1\leq N\leq 10^4$) find amount of positive numbers not greater than $N$ that coprime with $N$. Let us call two positive integers (say, $A$ and $B$, for example) coprime if (and only if) their greatest common divisor is 1. (i.e. $A$ and $B$ are coprime iff $\mathrm{gcd}\left(A,B\right) = 1$). Input Input file contains integer $N$. Output Write answer in output file. Sample Input 1 9
